step_feedback.feedback: Your shoulder blades are moving well, but try to keep your wrists a bit more relaxed and closer to your body. Focus on the shoulder movement.
Good job on the shoulder movement! Your elbows are staying relatively close, which is great. Keep your wrists a little more stable.
Excellent! Your shoulders are moving nicely. Try to keep your wrists a bit more relaxed and less extended, especially on the left side.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with your shoulder rolls! Remember to gently squeeze your shoulder blades back and down in a circle. Try to keep your wrists relaxed and focus on the shoulder movement for best results.
